page.title: 06Jobs
page.content: These are most of the jobs of the people of Fordoun village: Fencer 1, Tractormen 2, Office Worker 1, Lorry Drivers 3, Builder 1, Railway Workers 2, Furniture Remover 1,Garage Owner 1, Garage Worker 1, Joiner 4, Shop Workers 2, Engineers 2, Plumber 1, Farm Workers 2, Forester 1, Hotel Owners 2, Hotel Workers 2, Road Worker 1, Oil Rig Worker 2, Digerman 1, Unknown jobs in Aberdeen 2, Tractor Agent 1. Farm Workers these are the farms and the number of workers on them. Wester Waterlair 1, Whiteriggs 9, Balfeith 8, Redmyre 1, Waterlair 1, Whiteriggs 9, Balfeith 8, Redmyre 1, Waterlair 1, Upper Powburn 1, Mill of Conveth 4, Lower Powburn 2, Pittarow 3, Achenzeoh 3, Pittengardner 3, Cairton 4.
